entry.string: The module [#(1)] should be activated first.
Currently, this is the only supported feature - more will come later.

This is the full path to the directory where Derivative images will be stored. It is stronly recommended that this directory be located outside of your web directory.
NOTE: This directory MUST be writable by the webserver.
Unable to display - file '#(1)' does not exist!
Unable to display. File '#(1)' is either not an image or does not exist.
Required attributes '#(1)' and '#(2)' for tag <xar:image> are missing. See tag documentation.
Required parameter '#(1)' is missing or not numeric.
